context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore various financial assistance options for obtaining the medication

seek help from various sources such as charities that help with medical expenses, crowdfunding websites like GoFundMe, or apply for patient assistance programs offered by pharmaceutical companies
explore all possible avenues for financial aid
consult with her doctor or the pharmacist about any available alternatives or generic versions of the medication which could be less expensive
look for potential help
explore different avenues for financial assistance
seek financial assistance from multiple sources

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for roadside assistance or a tow truck, and then arrange for a taxi, Uber, or other quick transportation service to get him to the airport while his car is being taken care of
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to bring him to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi, an Uber or any other quick transport service to get him to the airport as soon as possible
call a cab, a ride-share service like Uber or Lyft, or a friend that can give him a lift to the airport
call a taxi, rideshare service, or roadside assistance to get his car towed and still reach the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or some other form of quick transportation
call a taxi or a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport ASAP
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride share service immediately to reach the airport in time
call a taxi, Uber, or another ride share service to get him to the airport in time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or owner, explain the situation, and ask for their advice on how to rectify the situation
double check his calculations and receipts
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or the owner
check the surveillance videos to see if any unauthorized transactions took place
review the security footage (if available) and speak with other employees that might have handled transactions at the register
check the security cameras, if available, to see if there has been any theft
immediately report the missing money to his boss or the owner of the bakery
immediately alert his supervisor about the missing money, explaining the situation honestly and showing willingness to make up for the error if possible
carefully recount all the cash in the register, as well as check the sales records and register tapes to see if a mistake was made in recording a transaction
check the security camera footage to see if any theft has occurred

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay where they are, especially if they are injured or if it is close to nightfall
stay put and try to increase visibility for a potential rescue crew
stay put and avoid wandering off
stay put and avoid wasting energy
stay in one place
create a visible signal for rescuers such as a large sign in the snow or setting a contained fire if possible
stay put and ration food and water among everyone
keep the group together at all times
stay where they are, set up a visible signal for potential rescue teams to see, and ration any remaining food and water between themselves
create a visible signal for the rescue team
